resources.string: Agile Planning Poker not found.\n\nTo synchronize state between wearable and handheld, you must install the Agile Planning Poker app from Market.
Click here to install the app.
Click to start Agile Planning Poker app.
Synchronizing the state you can share the card background color, card text color, current selected deck, current selected card and the card visibility.
To synchronize the state between Agile Planning Poker and the wearable device you must start the Wearable Planning Poker app in your wearable device.
Using the menu \"Send State to Phone\" to apply Wearable Planning Poker state to Agile Planning Poker state.
And using the menu \"Get State from Phone\" to apply Agile Planning Poker state to Wearable Planning Poker state.
